name: muji wooden city blocks-tokyo, edo, london, or new york sets
description:
perfect for anyone who is interested in world cities, wants to pretend to be godzilla (for tokyo), or just likes blocks and/or urbanism (ages 3+).

the sets are available for tokyo,  london, or new york. please choose which set you would like from the drop down menu. edo (former tokyo) and kyoto city sets are currently unavailable. 

the varnished wooden pieces include skyscrapers, iconic buildings and structures from the respective cities, and cars and buses. the tallest buildings are 8-11 cm tall, the cars are 1.25 cm tall. comes with a drawstring linen bag that that has the name of the city and an abstract skyline printed on it.

shipping is airmail from japan, which takes 7-10 days on average to international destinations. if you would prefer to upgrade to EMS shipping, which is secure, trackable, express air from japan, let me know.

made by the japanese company muji as part of a holiday line of goods and therefore availability is limited. because of the small pieces and choking hazard, this item is not suitable for small children.

name: muji wooden world blocks-paris, china, taiwan, and world heritage sets
description:
perfect for anyone who is fascinated by world architecture, or just likes blocks and/or urbanism (ages 3+).

available sets are paris, china, taiwan, and world heritage.

the sets have varnished wooden pieces that include skyscrapers, iconic buildings, and structures, and cars and buses. the tallest buildings are about 10 cm tall, the cars are 1.25 cm tall. comes with a drawstring cotton bag that has the name of the set printed on it  kyoto

shipping is airmail from japan, which takes 7-10 days on average to international destinations. if you would prefer to upgrade to EMS shipping, which is secure, trackable, express air from japan, let me know.

made by the japanese company muji as part of a holiday line of goods, availability is limited. because of the small pieces and choking hazard, this item is not suitable for small children.

name: tokyo or edo map on cloth
description:
this is one of the series of maps on cotton cloth from muji.

available in either the old edo (former tokyo) era historical map, or current tokyo. please chose edo, tokyo, or both (and get one of each) from the drop down menu.

there is also 1 more available cloth in this series, which is not pictured, of a map of current kyoto.

53 cm square, 100% cotton. hemmed to you can easily use it at a small handkerchief, napkin, or wrapping cloth.

name: port and boat block set from muji
description:
perfect for people who love boats (ages 3+).

this set of wooden boats include a sailboats, tugboats, cruise ships, some cargo containers, and port buildings like a drawbridge and lighthouse. painted or varnished wood.

the longest boats are 12 cm long, and the little tugboats are 4 cm long and 2 cm tall. there are 22 pieces total.

comes in a cloth bag with a an outline drawing of the port pieces, and the words 'port' on both sides.

shipping is airmail from japan, which takes 7-10 days on average to international destination. if you would prefer to upgrade to EMS shipping, which is secure, trackable, express air from japan, let me know.

made by the japanese company muji as part of a holiday line of goods from years past, and therefore availability is limited.

because of the small pieces and choking hazard, this item is not suitable for small children.

name: train station wooden blocks from muji
description:
perfect for train enthusiansts, or people who love blocks (ages 3+).

this set of wooden trains include a station, trestle, 2 railroad crossing signs, passenger and freight train cars, a black engine and caboose, some cargo containers, and flat bed train cars. painted or varnished wood.

the largest piece is the station, which is 8 cm long and 4 cm tall. most of the train cars are 4 cm long and 1.5 cm tall. there are 26 pieces total.

comes in a cloth bag with a an outline drawing of the train pieces, and the words 'gare' on one side and 'railway station' on the other

shipping is airmail from japan, which takes 7-10 days on average to international destination. if you would prefer to upgrade to EMS shipping, which is secure, trackable, express air from japan, let me know.

made by the japanese company muji as part of a holiday line of goods from years past, and therefore availability is limited.

because of the small pieces and choking hazard, this item is not suitable for small children.
